title: Multimodal Mobile Microlearning Design for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in the medical field and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Mobile-based education for learners over 40 in managerial/leadership roles in BYOD environments, applying project-based assessments centered on practical tasks immediately applicable to medical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistical techniques for patient data analysis and interpret the results.
Learners can design optimization strategies for medical processes using simulation tools provided by mobile applications.
Learners can establish and implement problem-solving strategies for real-world medical scenarios through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
